• New Feature!! Automatic vocabulary lists from the news: everyday Yomiwa will show you a list of keyword from the recent news. Together with each word details you will be able to check the source article and read it easily by adding furiganas to the Japa

• In the settings you can now increase or decrease the overall font size of the app

• Yomiwa wall: Various design improvements. Also, you can now edit or delete your messages
• In the dictionary search, for each word you can see the date of the last time you have encountered this word in Yomiwa
• Minor bug fixes

• Yomiwa wall: Various design improvements. Also, you can now edit or delete your messages
• In the dictionary search, for each word you can see the date of the last time you have encountered this word in Yomiwa
• Minor bug fixes

• New Translator capability! Yomiwa can now translate whole Japanese sentences to English using its own offline translation technology
• Add example sentences: you can now submit Japanese phrases together with their translation in your preferred target

• New Translator capability! Yomiwa can now translate whole Japanese sentences to English using its own offline translation technology

• Text that you have copied outside the app is now automatically looked up when you open the app

• Added Kanji lists ordered by JLPT levels as well as Grade levels
